positions.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
positions.description: As a Senior Frontend Developer I work on various company projects, developing solutions using technologies such as NextJS, AstroJS, and vanilla TypeScript with ViteJS and PWA. Responsible for building complex voice recognition systems, integrating browser APIs for Speech to Text, state management, performance optimization, and real-time connections via WebSocket. Additionally, I work with GraphQL APIs to ensure efficient data flow and Sentry for application monitoring and error tracking. I am involved from the early stages of system development, always adhering to best coding practices and delivering robust, scalable solutions. I also implement automated testing using Jest, Vitest, and Cypress to ensure code quality and reliability. I collaborate closely with the design team to implement high-fidelity user interfaces, ensuring accurate layouts align with visual and functional specifications. I also contribute to CI/CD processes, creating workflows that ensure the application functions correctly with the newly developed code. Additionally, I help protect working branches as a security layer, ensuring that all code goes through the necessary validation stages before being deployed to production.

positions.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
positions.description: As a Senior Frontend Developer I'm working on various products for the company Droz, defining architectures for the Frontend, CI processes and application standardization. Together with the Design team, we have developed a Design System for the company. I have developed a library of components and Design System that is used by all of Droz's products. The library has tests and accessibility for all the components, as well as extensive documentation using Storybook. We were able to greatly speed up the construction of new products with the library and the standards applied.

positions.title: Frontend Engineer

positions.title: Frontend Engineer
